# Lord

𓎟 ≈ 𓋞 ≈ Nabu / 𒈾𒀊𒅕 napir "god" 𒀭 in Elamite!  
𓎟 ≈ 𓇹 @ 𜎂𜎯𜒋    𒈾𒎕    napir "moon" / "god"  𒀭𒌗  𓇺  
𓎟 ≈ 𓇳  @ 𜎂𜎯𜏳𜒋𜎊         Napirriša "Great God" 𒀭𒌓  

𒌗 ≈ 𒎕 PIR is similar to late forms of the sun sign:  
𒌓 ≈ 𒑊𒁹 UTᵒⁿ 𓇋 𓏏 𓈖 [𓇳](𓇳.html) υθν [天](天.html) tiān [2](2.html) ΘΩΝ θων θυν > 𐤏υν > [sun](sun.html)
𒌓 ≈ 𒑊𒁹 UTᵒⁿ 天 tiān ti[tan](tan.html) 帝 Dì 𐀪 [don](don.html) deon theon [god](god.html)

[𒀭](𒀭.html) DINGIR diŋir Diener Deon Theon Deus Theus Zeus  

𓊹𓊹𓊹 Dryhten "Lord" From Proto-Germanic *druhtinaz. Cognate with Old Frisian drochten, Old Saxon drohtin, Old High German truhtin, Old Norse dróttinn. *druhtiz band of troop, "director" drag duce ≠ *dʰrewgʰ Trug  

𓅝 𓏏 𓏮 𓀭 | Thoth | ḏḥwt Drihten = "God" @ Anglo-Saxon 995  

𓁣 Seth  

𓋞 Nebo = sky **нєбо heaven** 𓇯 Nabᵒ = sun ꯅꯨꯃꯤꯠ numit@Burma ngit  
𓋞 Nabu “God” 𒈾𒀊;𒈾𒀊𒁀;𒈾𒀊𒉿;𒈾𒉈𒅁  nap; nab; na-ap; na-ab-ba; na-ap-pi; na-bí-ip  
𓋞 Nabu ⇔ 𓇺 𒈾𒀊𒅕;𒈾𒎕; na-ap-ir; na-pir;  "moon" 𒀭𒌗 AN.buran@Malay vs 𒀭𒌓 AN.UTU Nahunte 𒈾𒄷𒋼

𓊹 𓄤 | the good god |  

𒄴𒈨 gudu₄ god-priest, lustration priest, purification priest “pašīšum”@Akkat big-man 𒄴 ᴮAḪ ⇔ بغ bağ god

󳕃 󳕄 󳕅 󳕆 󳕇 󳕈 󳕉 󳕊 󳕋 󳕌 󳕍 󳕎 󳕏 󳕐 󳕑 󳕒 󳕓 󳕔 󳕕 󳕖 󳕗 󳕘 󳕙 󳕚 󳕛 󳕜 󳕝 󳕞 󳕟 󳕠 󳕡 󳕢 󳕣 󳕤 󳕥 󳕦 󳕧 󳕨 󳕩 󳕪 󳕫 󳕬 󳕭 󳕮 󳕯 󳕰 󳕱 󳕲 󳕳 󳕴 󳕵 󳕶 󳕷 󳕸 󳕹 󳕺 󳕻 󳕼 󳕽 󳕾 󳕿 󳖀 󳖁 󳖂 󳖃 󳖄 󳖅 󳖆 󳖇 󳖈 󳖉 󳖊 󳖋 󳖌 󳖍 󳖎 󳖏 󳖐 󳖑 󳖒 󳖓 󳖔 󳖕 󳖖 󳖗 󳖘 󳖙 󳖚 󳖛  
󳖜 󳖝 󳖞 󳖟 󳖠 󳖡 󳖢 󳖣 󳖤 󳖥 󳖦 󳖧 󳖨 󳖩 󳖪 󳖫 󳖬 󳖭 󳖮 󳖯 󳖰 󳖱 󳖲 󳖳 󳖴 󳖵 󳖶 󳖷 󳖸 󳖹 󳖺 󳖻 󳖼 󳖽 󳖾 󳖿 󳗀 󳗁 󳗂 󳗃 󳗄 󳗅  
󳗆 󳗇 󳗈 󳗉 󳗊 󳗋 󳗌 󳗍 󳗎 󳗏 󳗐 󳗑 󳗒 󳗓 󳗔 󳗕 󳗖 󳗗 󳗘 󳗙 󳗚 󳗛 󳗜 󳗝 󳗞 󳗟 󳗠 󳗡 󳗢 󳗣 󳗤 󳗥 󳗦 󳗧 󳗨 󳗩 󳗪 󳗫 󳗬 󳗭 󳗮 󳗯 󳗰 󳗱 󳗲 󳗳 󳗴 󳗵 󳗶 󳗷 󳗸 󳗹 󳗺 󳗻 󳗼 󳗽 󳗾 󳗿 󳘀 󳘁 󳘂 󳘃 󳘄 󳘅 󳘆 󳘇 󳘈 󳘉 󳘊 󳘋 󳘌 󳘍 󳘎 󳘏 󳘐 󳘑 󳘒 󳘓 󳘔 󳘕 󳘖 󳘗 󳘘 󳘙 󳘚 󳘛 󳘜 󳘝 󳘞 󳘟 󳘠 󳘡 󳘢 󳘣 󳘤 󳘥 󳘦 󳘧 󳘨 󳘩 󳘪 󳘫 󳘬 󳘭 󳘮 󳘯 󳘰 󳘱 󳘲 󳘳 󳘴 󳘵 󳘶 󳘷 󳘸 󳘹 󳘺 󳘻 󳘼 󳘽 󳘾 󳘿 󳙀 󳙁 󳙂 󳙃 󳙄 󳙅 󳙆 󳙇 󳙈 󳙉 󳙊 󳙋 󳙌 󳙍 󳙎 󳙏 󳙐 󳙑 󳙒 󳙓 󳙔 󳙕 󳙖 󳙗 󳙘 󳙙 󳙚 󳙛 󳙜 󳙝 󳙞 󳙟 󳙠 󳙡 󳙢 󳙣 󳙤 󳙥 󳙦 󳙧 󳙨 󳙩 󳙪 󳙫 󳙬 󳙭 󳙮 󳙯 󳙰 󳙱 󳙲 󳙳 󳙴 󳙵 󳙶 󳙷 󳙸 󳙹 󳙺 󳙻 󳙼 󳙽  

ⲛⲟⲩϫ ↔ ⲛⲓϣϯ 	 great
ⲛⲟⲩϯ 	 	mf. (any) GOD; adj. godly, divine PATER NOSTER ⲛⲟⲩⲧⲉ NATURE
ⲫⲛⲟⲩϯ 	 m. god
ⲁⲧⲛⲟⲩϯ 	 adj. godless
ⲉⲣⲁⲧⲛⲟⲩϯ 	 be godless
ⲙⲉⲧⲛⲟⲩϯ 	 f. divinity
ⲙⲁⲓⲛⲟⲩϯ 	 n. god-loving
ⲙⲉⲧⲙⲁⲓⲛⲟⲩϯ 	 f. godliness, piety
ⲙⲁⲥⲛⲟⲩϯ 	 f. god-bearing, mother ofgod (virgin mary)
ⲣⲉϥⲙⲉⲥⲛⲟⲩϯ 	 n. god-bearer
ⲙⲁⲥⲧⲉⲛⲟⲩϯ 	 n. god-hater
ⲉⲣⲛⲟⲩϯ 	 be god
ϣⲁⲙϣⲉⲛⲟⲩϯ 	 n. serving god; god-server
ⲙⲉⲧϣⲁⲙϣⲉⲛⲟⲩϯ 	 f. god-service,piety
ⲣⲉϥϣⲉⲙϣⲉⲛⲟⲩϯ 	 m. god-serving,pious person
ⲣⲉϥϫⲫⲉⲛⲟⲩϯ 	 n. god-bearer
ⲛⲟϣⲉⲣ 	 	m. vulture, falcon

𓊹 𓈖 ≈ 𒉌𒉌 ì.lí ili ilī 𒀭 "gods" 𒉌𒉌 NIᵗʳ 𓇷 𓏏 𓊹 𓊹 𓊹 𓀭 𓏪 Ennead < 𓇸 

𓊹 𓏏 𓂋 Peter баатар baatar “hero” < bogatyr <> Boga भगवान् bhagavān "God"
2.) Богъ Bogŭ Бог Bůh 𐔱𐔼𐕀𐔰𐕃𐕒𐕡𐕘 bixaʒ́uġ бурхан burxan ᠪᠤᠷᠬᠠᠨ burqan
